metadata.title: CVE-2022-0371 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 11.4 before 14.5.4, all versions starting from 14.6 before14.6.4, all versions starting from 14.7 before 14.7.1. GitLab search mayallow authenticated users to search other users by their respective privateemails even if a user set their email to private.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
